text:
@holly_cummins Great post, there’s a talk in there somewhere. 

You should feel able to bring your whole self with you. It’s sad that we’ve made a world where you don’t feel able to do that.

author.name: Ian Cooper
author.description: Coding Architect in London, speaker, tabletop gamer, geek. Tattooed, pierced, and bearded. The 'guv' on @BrighterCommand. Also @ICooper@hachyderm.io He/him.
